mapper.update: update trademark_info set unit_name = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commodity_category = #{commodityCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, application_number = #{applicationNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, effective_date = #{effectiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, register_notice_date = #{registerNoticeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, entry_person = #{entryPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trademark_name = #{trademarkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, applicant = #{applicant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_date = #{registerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, law_status = #{lawStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entry_date = #{entryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, file = #{files,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_unit_id = #{createUnitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_unit_name = #{createUnitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, secret_level = #{secretLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, knowledge_scope = #{knowledgeScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extension_period = #{extensionPeriod,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_well_known = #{isWellKnown,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_registered = #{isRegistered,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country_type = #{countryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, knowledge_person = #{knowledgePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trademark_type = #{tradeMarkType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, well_known_date = #{wellKnownDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, famous_date = #{famousDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, well_known_org = #{wellKnownOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, famous_org = #{famousOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_org = #{registerOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select from view_trademark_info where 1=1
and deleted != '1'
select count(*) from trademark_info where 1=1 and deleted != '1'

select b.name,count(1) as num from trademark_info a left join sys_dictionary b on a.law_status = b.num_value and b.parent_code = 'ROOT_KJPT_FLZT(SB)' where a.deleted != '1' GROUP BY a.law_status union all select '全部' as name,count(1) as num from trademark_info where deleted != '1'
